Methods in de.mpg.aai.shhaa.authz that throw AuthorizationException
 void AuthorizationHandler.checkAccess(AuthenticationContext authCtx, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
